replies.message:
You should be ashamed.  -EMINEM Explicitly Endorses Violence, Particularly Violence Against Women - who have, throughout history, been oppressed, discriminated against, raped, beaten, burned, hung, tortured, and more.
-Eminem's lyrics help desensitize boys and men to the pain and suffering of girls and women.
-Girls are encouraged to be attracted to boys and men who don't respect women.
-Eminem perpetuates damaging mythology about abusive men.
-Eminem practices verbal bullying and degrading people (especially women and gays) and then claiming "I was just kidding around."
-Eminem's fake "rebel" image obscures the fact that sexism and men's violence against women perpetuates established male power – it is not rebellious or revolutionary!
